name: Fresh Fried Largemouth Bass
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Nothing beats fresh fried fish and largemouth bass is one of the best. I actually prefer bass over bream. Serve with cut fries if desired.
ingredients: 1 pound largemouth bass fillets, cut into bite-sized pieces
directions: Add salt and cover with water
Cover and let sit for 30 minutes to draw out all blood
Rinse bass thoroughly to remove salt
Heat oil in a deep-fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place cornmeal, flour, seasoned salt, paprika, and pepper in a gallon-sized plastic bag
Zip and shake until evenly combined
Drop 2 pieces of bass into the bag, zip, and shake to coat
Fry bass in the preheated deep fryer for 3 minutes per batch
Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate
